mapper.insert: insert into mkt_cam_item (MKT_CAM_ITEM_ID, MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, ITEM_TYPE, ITEM_ID, PRIORITY, ITEM_GROUP, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK, LAN_ID) values (#{mktCamItemId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{mktCampaignId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{itemType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{priority,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{itemGroup,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lanId,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.update: update mkt_cam_item set MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID = #{mktCampaignId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ITEM_TYPE = #{itemType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ITEM_ID = #{itemId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PRIORITY = #{priority,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ITEM_GROUP = #{itemGroup,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAN_ID = #{lanId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where MKT_CAM_ITEM_ID = #{mktCamItemId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select MKT_CAM_ITEM_ID, MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, ITEM_TYPE, ITEM_ID, PRIORITY, ITEM_GROUP, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK, LAN_ID from mkt_cam_item where MKT_CAM_ITEM_ID = #{mktCamItemId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select MKT_CAM_ITEM_ID, MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, ITEM_TYPE, ITEM_ID, PRIORITY, ITEM_GROUP, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK, LAN_ID from mkt_cam_item
